title: CAPA - Valve Control System Enhancement - Paracetamol
description: Upgrade valve actuators with digital position feedback systems. Implement valve performance verification procedures and establish backup manual operation capabilities for critical valves.

title: CAPA - Motor Drive System Upgrade - Ibuprofen
description: Replace motor drive controllers with advanced units having better stability. Implement real-time speed monitoring with automatic adjustment capabilities and backup drive availability.

title: CAPA - Equipment Sensor Reliability Program - Atorvastatin Calcium
description: Implement redundant sensor systems with cross-validation algorithms. Establish sensor preventive maintenance schedule and operator training on alarm response procedures.

title: CAPA - Material Identification System Upgrade - Metformin HCl
description: Implement barcode/RFID tracking system for all incoming materials. Establish dual identity verification procedures and supplier labeling requirements enhancement.

title: CAPA - Laboratory Environmental Control Improvement - Amlodipine Besylate
description: Install enhanced HVAC system in analytical laboratory with tighter temperature control. Implement environmental monitoring with automatic alerts and establish instrument warm-up procedures.

title: CAPA - Equipment Sensor Reliability Program - Sofosbuvir
description: Implement redundant sensor systems with cross-validation algorithms. Establish sensor preventive maintenance schedule and operator training on alarm response procedures.

title: CAPA - Equipment Sensor Reliability Program - Sitagliptin Phosphate
description: Implement redundant sensor systems with cross-validation algorithms. Establish sensor preventive maintenance schedule and operator training on alarm response procedures.

title: CAPA - Heat Exchanger Maintenance Program - Olanzapine
description: Implement automated cleaning-in-place systems and establish fouling monitoring procedures. Develop heat exchanger performance tracking and preventive cleaning schedule optimization.
